title: Sick of Yasuo xD
body: I swear they need to trim some of the edges on this cancer champ. This "glass cannon" screws any champ who has ranged autos but no gapclosers....  (Cass excused). Really how is any adc with no gapclosers meant to run away from the fker. He can be played Top, mid or jg.. Most champs who can do that have visible weaknesses in one of those roles... He has so many tools at his disposal.. Too reliable in my opinion.. Like an Elise in the jungle.. Always relevant if played right normal. He's pretty much a better Vi. Even she got nerfed till every single jungler is better than her..

I love playing against Yasuo in mid lane. I have yet to lose to him when I rush Zhonya. What really annoys me is when suddenly he goes from 0/4 to 5/4 because he finished two items. That's not fun at all.

if you want to fuck with every yasou who isn't really high elo is use a counterpick cho'gath for top or sometimes even mid. Your e's if managed right zone him pretty hard since they burst his passive and are near impossible to dodge through dashes. Your q is hard to land unless you can predict his movements but the point is that you sustain more than his tornado thing and zone him pretty easy with some natural tankiness. Your w shuts down his dashes and leaves him awkwardly walking through minions to back off. His ult is the great bit though since you have alot of natural tankiness you just need to play safe and if he is dumb enough to ult you, you can still drop a q underneath yourself, w silence him and then aa with e and proc thunderlords and then feast him and he's often screwed. Cho'gath is really easy to play and yasou has a really hard time in lane with him so even if they have much superior technical skill; they will probably still lose lane.

His early game is a bit weak, but he scales a fuckin' ridiculous 100% and 150% and can achieve 100% critical strike chance with ease.

There is a reason he is banned in high ELO. Don't need to worry about him at low ELO because people think making cool and flashy plays is more important than farming as a hyper-hyper-hypercarry.

The amount of times I've seen Yasuo dive towers or 5 man killing people and walking out full health like nothing happened is ridiculous. I'm all for skill and outplays so on and so on, but in the words of Riot, "You can't have everything". Well he does. 
There are only a few champions that have kits that are noticeably stronger than every other champion in the game, yet they still have the ability also to do massive amounts of damage, Yasuo is in the extreme zone with sustain, damage, wind wall, maneuverability and a shield for a passive. Only kindred and Malzahar come close to him just based on his kit and look at how often they are abused and picked in any elo!
In low elo the midlaner will feed him anyway. Then he just roams bot and rolls em. Only counter is to go mid or ban. Guarantee he will get firstblood in first 2mins.

I legit can not stand them anymore, good or bad, they need to go!


the problem is that unlike other champs he isn't punished for mistakes anywhere near as much.

I'm just bored of there always being a yasou in every game especially in normals where I can say with 40% certainty that midlane will be a yasou mirror lane. The worst part about this is this matchup never goes even and one side will feed like crazy and then the rest of the team has to struggle with a super fed hypercarry.  Whilst the other team has to deal with a yasou that is 4 levels behind and has 8 farm by 20min. Also he's a problem in low elo's and unranked because there isn't enough tanks and cc.
 If you can counterpick him it's not that bad, at low elo there is no way a decent cho'gath will lose to a yasou. The yas will try to outplay the cho'gath and the cho'gath will wonder what outplay tastes like and eat him. There's a number of matchups that yasou won't enjoy in mid or top.
The worst bit is how toxic yasou players seem to be. It's the new riven. You could be going 0-1-4 and the yasou will still flame you for 'feeding' and or if you're on the enemy team and you win lane; they will just start filling the chat with complaints about how your champion is op and unbalanced and requires no skill even if you're playing midlane soraka (mid was afk I am aware this is S6). And they always threaten to dodge if you don't pick a knockup comp; which is super irritating if they lose lane hard and do no damage.

His dashes, high damage, windwall and lifesteal from warlords bloodlust is annoying too because you pick a fight with him when you have full hp and he has the tiniest speck of health and he still walks all over you if he's ahead and you don't have cc.

I acknowledge he takes alot of skill to play but I'm getting tired of seeing yasou (and alot of other super meta picks) in every game. The only role I see diversity in atm is support and that's mostly because people are annoyed that they have to play support and so you see tank aatrox, ap garen or regular yorrick sup.
